cs213.photoAlbum.control

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.control.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient

    public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
implements IClient
    The Client class provides an interface to the user to perform user functions. Acts as an intermediary between the user and the backend interface, ensuring validity of pass

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Client(IBackend backendInterface)
      Constructs a client object that makes calls to the backend using the passed object, which implements the backend interface.

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        id - - unique id of new user
        name - - name of user. Need not be unique.
        Returns:

      • addPhoto

        public boolean addPhoto(java.lang.String filename,
                        java.lang.String caption,
                        java.lang.String albumName)
        Adds a photo to an album. Passed filename must be the name of an existing file on disk, need not be a photo file. Caption will be associated with photo, unless filename has already been added to an album in this user's collection, in which case the previous caption will be retained. AlbumName is name of album to which the photo is being added.
        Specified by:
        addPhoto in interface IClient
        Parameters:
        filename - - of an existing file on disk
        caption - - caption to be associated with file, only if photo is being added for first time.
        albumName - - of an existing album, that does not already contain photo associated with filename.
        Returns:
        true if and only if filename is an existing file, albumName exists, and albumName does not already contain filename

      • getUser

        public User getUser()
        Specified by:
        getUser in interface IClient
        Returns:
        User object corresponding to currently logged in user

      • movePhoto

        public boolean movePhoto(java.lang.String filename,
                         java.lang.String oldAlbumName,
                         java.lang.String newAlbumName)
        Moves photo associated with filename from oldAlbumName to newAlbumName. Checks validity of input arguments and passes to user method.
        Specified by:
        movePhoto in interface IClient
        Parameters:
        filename - - must exist in oldAlbumname
        oldAlbumName - - must exist in user collection and contain photo associated with filename
        newAlbumName - - must exist in user collection and not already contain photo associated with filename
        Returns:
        true if and only if both oldAlbumName and newAlbumName exist, oldAlbumName contains filename, and newAlbumName does not contain filename

      • removePhoto

        public boolean removePhoto(java.lang.String filename,
                           java.lang.String albumName)
        Remove photo from album.
        Specified by:
        removePhoto in interface IClient
        Parameters:
        filename - - must exist in albumName
        albumName - - must exist in user album collection
        Returns:
        true if and only if albumName exists, and filename exists in albumName

      • addTag

        public boolean addTag(java.lang.String filename,
                      java.lang.String tagType,
                      java.lang.String tagValue)
        Add tag to a photo. If photo associated with filename is present in multiple albums, tag will added to all references of filename
        Specified by:
        addTag in interface IClient
        Parameters:
        filename - - must exist somewhere in users collection.
        tagType - - must be 0, 1, or 2
        tagValue - - value of tag
        Returns:
        true if and only if tagType is of existing type and filename exists in user collection

      • deleteTag

        public boolean deleteTag(java.lang.String filename,
                         java.lang.String tagType,
                         java.lang.String tagValue)
        Delete a tag from a photo. If photo associated with filename is present in multiple albums, tag will be deleted from all references of filename
        Specified by:
        deleteTag in interface IClient
        Parameters:
        filename - - must exist in user collection
        tagType - - tag type of tag wanted for deletion. Must be 0, 1, or 2
        tagValue - - value of tag wanted for deletion.
        Returns:
        true if and only if filename exists, and tag identified by tagType and tagValue exists for filename.

      • getPhoto

        public Photo getPhoto(java.lang.String filename)
        Get photo object associated with filename.
        Specified by:
        getPhoto in interface IClient
        Parameters:
        filename - - must exist in user collection
        Returns:
        Photo object associated with filename. Null if filename does not exist.
